column4: I recently a) started using networkmanager and b) changed my login password. When I did the latter, NetworkManager started requiring my *old* password to connect to my wireless network. How can I make it go back to not asking for my password?
Go to applications -> accessories -> passwords and encryption keys, and right click the group and select change password
if I set it to my new password, it won't ask for any password?
it worked for me when I changed my pw at least :) and it doesn't ask now
